497867.title: Child Bringing Bouquet to Woman
497867.plot: Eadweard Muybridge's motion photography film depicts a child bringing a bouquet of flowers to a topless woman who kisses his cheek.

515791.title: Woman Throwing Baseball
515791.plot: A series of photographic images by photographer Eadweard Muybridge, showing a nude woman picking up a baseball and throwing it.

520299.title: Chickens Scared by Torpedo
520299.plot: Chickens are scared of a torpedo.

567705.title: Cat Trotting, Changing to a Gallop
567705.plot: Individual photographs of a cat trotting then changing to a gallop shown in quick succession.

573812.title: Cockatoo Flying
573812.plot: Plate 762 from Eadweard J. Muybridge’s Animal Locomotion (1884-86)

576717.title: Elephant Walking
576717.plot: A series of photographs picturing an elephant walking.

576729.title: Goat Walking
576729.plot: A series of images photographed by Eadweard Muybridge, featuring a goat walking.

594107.title: A Woman Throwing on a Shawl
594107.plot: A woman walks as she throws on a shawl.

607265.title: Throwing Self on Heap of Hay
607265.plot: A woman throws herself on a heap of hay.

695779.title: Lion Walking
695779.plot: A series of photographs depicting a male lion walking, shot by Eadweard Muybridge.

704352.title: Boys Playing Leapfrog: Side View
704352.plot: A brief series photography by Eadweard Muybridge featuring two boys playing leapfrog.

763834.title: Semi-Nude Woman Hopping on Left Foot
763834.plot: Two separate series of photographs, (one taken from the front, the other from the back) showing a nude woman jumping up and down on one foot.

850812.title: Waltzes: Clothed and Unclothed
850812.plot: Earliest moving images of social dancing, depicting a clothed man and woman waltzing, two nude women waltzing, and a single nude woman waltzing.

877152.title: Capybara Walking
877152.plot: Eadweard Muybridge photographs a capybara in motion.

916695.title: Woman Picking Up Skirt
916695.plot: A series of images of a nude model picking up a translucent skirt from the floor.

916698.title: Woman Sitting Down
916698.plot: Eadweard Muybridge's nude female model sits down in a chair in a series of photographs taken to study the human locomotion.

916699.title: Woman Jumping from Rock to Rock
916699.plot: A nude model wearing a see-through skirt jumping from one rock another other rock. It begins on a frontal view and ends on a side view.

916702.title: Woman Opening Umbrella
916702.plot: A detailed human locomotion study of photos, showing a woman opening a parasol.

916703.title: Woman Getting Into Bed
916703.plot: A film experiment featuring one of Eadweard Muybridge's nude female models getting into a bed.

916704.title: Woman Picking Up Child
916704.plot: This series of photographs depict two nude models: a woman and a young child, as the woman picks up the child.

916705.title: Crossing Brook on Step-Stones with Fishing Pole and Can
916705.plot: A semi-nude female model crosses a creek on stepping stones, in one hand a fishing pole; in the other a basket.

916708.title: Woman Setting Down Jug
916708.plot: A nude model poses for a series of photographs, which depict her setting down a jug on the floor.

916709.title: Woman Pouring from Jug
916709.plot: Eadweard Muybridge's nude female model is depicted in a series of images, detailing her bending over and pouring water from a jug.

916714.title: Man Taking Off His Boater
916714.plot: A series of photographs of a man in a suit taking a hat off his head.

950159.title: Ostrich Running
950159.plot: A study of locomotion in an ostrich.

995031.title: Rowing Man
995031.plot: Nude man rowing, Muybridge's Plate no. 327.

995055.title: Man batting
995055.plot: Nude man playing cricket, batting and back cut (Animal Locomotion, plate 293) Eadweard Muybridge, 1887.

995057.title: A man bearing load on shoulder
995057.plot: A man bearing load on shoulder. Photogravure after Eadweard Muybridge, 1887. Plate 31.

995068.title: A man throwing a ball.
995068.plot: Nude man throwing a ball. Collotype by Eadweard Muybridge, 1887. Plate 273.

995070.title: A man running
995070.plot: Plate 7 from the Animal Locomotion series shows a nude man running in a peculiar way.

995073.title: A Man Walking
995073.plot: A man walking is the first plate (Plate no 1) in Muybridge's Animal Locomotion series from 1887. It shows a naked man walking.

995074.title: Nude man playing baseball, batting
995074.plot: Plate 276 from  Animal locomotion: an electro-photographic investigation of consecutive phases of animal movements.

995077.title: A Man Lifting a Trunk
995077.plot: Plate 382 from the Animal Locomotion series.

995078.title: Two naked men wrestling
995078.plot: One of 781 collotypes (plate no. 348) which form Eadweard Muybridge's magnum opus, Animal locomotion, 1887.

995153.title: Dog Running
995153.plot: Eadweard Muybridge photographs a dog running from two different angles: one from the side, one from the back.

995555.title: Naked man performing a wrestling lock
995555.plot: From a series of plate featuring men performing various wrestling moves. This one is plate 346.

995556.title: A man walking up stairs
995556.plot: This is plate 88 from Muybridge's Animal Locomotion.

995946.title: Large Woman Walking
995946.plot: Plate 19 from the Animal Locomotion series.

995947.title: Woman Enjoying a Smoke
995947.plot: This is plate 247 from the Animal Locomotion Series.

995949.title: Man walking downstairs carrying a basket
995949.plot: A man walk downstairs, carrying a basket. From the Animal Locomotion series, plate no. 136.

1003019.title: A gargantuan woman getting up off the ground
1003019.plot: A chronophotograph by Eadweard Muybridge. Photogravure a Wellcome V0048663.

1003031.title: A double amputee climbing on to a chair, descending from a chair
1003031.plot: A chronophotograph by Eadweard Muybridge. Wellcome V0048745.

1003035.title: A gymnast performing on the rings
1003035.plot: A chronophotograph by Eadweard Muybridge. Wellcome V0048739.

1003380.title: Women are passing each other by
1003380.plot: A chronophotograph by Eadweard Muybridge. Wellcome V0048632.

1003400.title: Two women sitting on the ground and smoking
1003400.plot: A chronophotograph by Eadweard Muybridge. Wellcome V0048656.

1003411.title: Two men fencing
1003411.plot: A chronophotograph by Eadweard Muybridge. Wellcome V0048680.

1003415.title: Two Men Boxing
1003415.plot: A chronophotograph by Eadweard Muybridge. Wellcome V0048677.

1003417.title: Two men boxing, one falls on mattress
1003417.plot: A chronophotograph by Eadweard Muybridge. Wellcome V0048676.

1003418.title: Two dogs racing
1003418.plot: A chronophotograph by Eadweard Muybridge. Wellcome V0048769.

1003420.title: Two deer jumping
1003420.plot: A chronophotograph by Eadweard Muybridge. Wellcome V0048764.

1012325.title: Woman Turning And Walking Upstairs
1012325.plot: A series of images by Eadweard Muybridge, featuring a nude model turning and walking upstairs.

1039038.title: Annie G. Galloping
1039038.plot: 16 photos in fast motion series showing a jockey and horse galloping. Plate 626 from Animal Locomotion, 1887.

159897.title: Man Walking Around a Corner
159897.plot: The last remaining production of Le Prince's LPCC Type-16 (16-lens camera) is part of a gelatine film shot in 32 images/second, and pictures a man walking around a corner. Le Prince, who was in Leeds (UK) at that time, sent these images to his wife in New York City in a letter dated 18 August 1887.
